Thu, 19 Oct 2023 22:55:00 +0000 National's Waikato MPs at Parliament on Tuesday, from left: Ryan Hamilton (Hamilton East); Scott Simpson (Coromandel); Louise Upston (Taupō); Tim van de Molen (Waikato); Tama Potaka (Hamilton West). Barbara Kuriger (Taranaki-King Country - inset right) was unavailable as her flight was cancelled due to strong wind. Inset left: Debbie Ngarewa-Packer (Te Tai Hauāuru), Hana-Rawhiti Maipi-Clarke (Hauraki-Waikato) and Rawiri Waititi (Waiariki). Main photo / Bradley Richardson
